name: Promotion Class - Icecaller
description:
Role: Healing

So versed in magic they can coalesce it into powerful healing and defensive creations.

Increases by 1:
Ice Storage Capacity

Increases by 450:
Support Power

Increases by 10%:
Final Mitigations Cap

Traits Granted:
Mail Armor Proficiency


WARNING: Purchasing this talent prevents access to the Archmage and Frostguard promotion classes.
